body:
This is sad 
Alexa play dispacito

How does one tag stuff on this site? Anyway, some admin or whatever, name tag this one as "High Score Girl". Surely after that (somehow charming, like Kemono Friends for a) 3DCG anime adaptation, more folks are going to be interested in finding this, except the vanilalalas, due to their ridiculous sensitivity towards anything that doesn't exclusively feature the main characters and how the mute game princess got smashed n filled in this one, though she's fine, she's a street fighter, she can take it.
Y u do dis this is so sad Alexa do a backflip
This is sad, why author-senseu why? There's a lot female leads that deserve the rape treatment, but Oono is not one of them.
